StoredProcedureOraclev10g.name: UPDATETUTORSTUDENT
StoredProcedureOraclev10g.source: CREATE OR REPLACE PROCEDURE GRUPO10.UPDATETUTORSTUDENT(pIDPerson IN NUMBER, pFirstName IN VARCHAR2, pSurname IN VARCHAR2,&lt;br/&gt;pTitle IN VARCHAR2, pAddress IN VARCHAR2, pPhone IN NUMBER, pPostcode IN NUMBER,&lt;br/&gt;pCampusLocation IN VARCHAR2, pYear IN NUMBER, pNumberHours IN NUMBER, pRate IN FLOAT) AS&lt;br/&gt;BEGIN &lt;br/&gt; UPDATE TutorStudent_table tutorS&lt;br/&gt; SET tutorS.surname = pSurname,&lt;br/&gt; tutorS.firstName = pFirstName,&lt;br/&gt; tutorS.title = pTitle,&lt;br/&gt; tutorS.address = pAddress,&lt;br/&gt; tutorS.phone = pPhone,&lt;br/&gt; tutorS.postcode = pPostcode,&lt;br/&gt; tutorS.campusLocation = pCampusLocation,&lt;br/&gt; tutorS.year = pYear,&lt;br/&gt; tutorS.numberHours = pNumberHours,&lt;br/&gt; tutorS.rate = pRate&lt;br/&gt; WHERE tutorS.idPerson = pIDPerson;&lt;br/&gt;END updateTutorStudent;
